CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Connectors (Line Anchoring)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will provide the ability to create more effective flowcharts and diagrams by allowing you to anchor lines between different shapes, making them move and reroute along with connected shapes.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Connectors (Line Anchoring)
OldVersion.description: This feature will provide the ability to create more effective flowcharts and diagrams by allowing you to anchor lines between different shapes, making them move and reroute along with connected shapes.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
OldVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Personalized Viva Goals Digest Emails
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Goals activity summary digest emails summarize and curate the most relevant content for users across their Viva Goals experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Personalized Viva Goals Digest Emails
OldVersion.description: Viva Goals activity summary digest emails summarize and curate the most relevant content for users across their Viva Goals experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
CurrentVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
OldVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
OldVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

CurrentVersion.title: Access: Making 32-bit Access Large Address Aware (LAA)
CurrentVersion.description: 32-bit Access will become Large Address Aware (LAA) to address 4G of memory, rather than 2G.

OldVersion.title: Access: Making 32-bit Access Large Address Aware (LAA)
OldVersion.description: 32-bit Access will become Large Address Aware (LAA) to address 4G of memory, rather than 2G.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva:  Viva Amplify -  Publish to Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,Campaign members can now additionally publish their publication to Viva Engage.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva:  Viva Amplify -  Publish to Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: Campaign members can now additionally publish their publication to Viva Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated Outlook for Android Settings
CurrentVersion.description: The whole Outlook for Android Settings page is being updated to be better organized so that you can find the settings you need more efficiently.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Updated Outlook for Android Settings
OldVersion.description: The whole Outlook for Android Settings page is being updated to be better organized so that you can find the settings you need more efficiently.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
CurrentVersion.description: ,Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
OldVersion.description: ,Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
OldVersion.description: ,The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
OldVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery Graph API for purge enhancements to include Exchange items and expand purge limit from 10 to 100
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins using the eDiscovery Graph APIs for purge to remove misplaced emails and or Teams messages from their storage locations can use the eDiscovery Graph API for both Exchange email items and Teams messages. In addition, the prior limit of 10 items per storage location will be expanded to 100 items per storage location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can block top level domain addresses within Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can block top level domain addresses within Tenant Allow/Block List.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: Increased number of tasks per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description:
Create and manage up to 1,500 tasks within a Microsoft Planner premium plan (formerly known as a Project for the web project).
More info: https://aka.ms/thenewplanner

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot deployment kits in Viva Amplify
CurrentVersion.description: ,Prepare for and launch Copilot in your organization using our new deployment kit in Viva Amplify. This is a set of pre-written and formatted publications that will educate users on how to use Copilot, all of the M365 endpoints, and develop their AI skills. This is a tested set of communications that the Microsoft team used internally to ensure the right messages are reaching your end users and preparing them for Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
OldVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by users within the Purview Audit feature, like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history, will now begin to generate Audit logs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
CurrentVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Admins/ Global admins do not require license to manage Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Provide Engage admins and Global admins the ability to manage Viva Engage without a licensed account.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Connectors (Line Anchoring)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will provide the ability to create more effective flowcharts and diagrams by allowing you to anchor lines between different shapes, making them move and reroute along with connected shapes.

CurrentVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.
